public class SLPasswordField
extends ECPasswordField
An ECTextField subclass that applies the stone look.

SLPasswordField()
Constructs a SLPasswordField with origin (0, 0) and zero width and height.
SLPasswordField(int, int, int, int)
Constructs a SLPasswordField with bounds (x, y, width, height).
SLPasswordField(Rect)
Constructs a SLPasswordField with bounds rect.
